description:
Like the name says, this is strong, grippy tape that can handle heavy-duty repairs. Use it to fix sleeping pads, down jackets, tent flies, tarps or rain gear. It also adds reflectivity to clothes, backpacks, panniers, helmets, and boats.

  • Highly reflective surface uses glass bead technology for incredible low-light visibility
  • Flexible tape conforms to shapes and corners without peeling and lifting
  • Tape is waterproof, weatherproof, durable and machine washable
  • Adheres to almost anything but doesn't leave a sticky residue when removed
  • Roll dimensions are 50 x 7.5cm. Grid marking on backer lets you cut custom shapes
name: Gear Aid Tenacious Tape Reflective
